perturbation.original_text: ENDORSEMENT shall include only the right to use the name, any nickname, initials, autograph, facsimile signature, photograph, portrait, likeness, and/or endorsement of Nantz.
perturbation.changed_text: ENDORSEMENT shall include the right to use the name of Nantz.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the detailed list of what 'ENDORSEMENT' includes (nickname, initials, autograph, etc.), but later sections still refer to the Endorsement, the contract introduces ambiguity. It's unclear what specific aspects of Nantz's persona the Company has rights to use.

perturbation.original_text: Nantz will be a full time Ashworth employee rather than an independent contractor.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly states Nantz will be a full-time employee. The change to 'collaborate' removes this clause while sections on compensation and stock options imply an employee status. This creates a contradiction regarding Nantz's employment status which impacts obligations such as benefits and tax implications.

perturbation.original_text: Nantz agrees to be nominated, elected to and serve on the Board of Directors of Company in the capacity of voting director.
perturbation.changed_text: Nantz will consult with the Board of Directors.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires Nantz to be a voting member of the Board of Directors. The modified text removes this obligation. However, later sections on insurance (Directors and Officers Insurance) assume he is a director. This creates a contradiction.
